forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers likely before 9am, then patchy fog and showers and thunderstorms. Some of the storms could produce heavy rain. Cloudy, with a high near 61. Northeast wind 6 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Rain Showers then Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers before 8pm. Cloudy, with a low around 53. Northeast wind around 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

weather_report:
The morning in Boston unfolds under a blanket of clouds, an atmospheric embrace that carries with it the lingering scent of rain. As the day begins with its first hints of life, the area remains prone to light showers, possibly heralding a more boisterous storm set to roll in. Fog drapes around the city, softening the landscape and obscuring its edges, a reminder of the rhythms of nature at play. With temperatures hovering near 61, dressed in layers may serve you well; a light raincoat or an umbrella would not be amiss. 

As the day progresses, one may find solace in quieter pursuits. Perhaps wander through the hushed halls of a nearby museum or seek the warm ambiance of a local café, where the aroma of freshly brewed coffee mingles with the gentle patter of rain on the windows. The evening will usher in a calmness, with a slight chance of rain tapering off as the sun sinks beneath the horizon, leaving behind a cool serenity. In this drenched urban tapestry, the day beckons us to savor its simplicity, finding pleasure in the mundane, as the world pauses to reflect beneath a gray, misty sky.
